Verses: 1 karththarukkaagap Porumaiyudan Kaaththirundhen; Avar Ennidamaaich Saaindhu, En Kooppidudhalaik Kettaar.
2 bayangaramaana Kuzhiyilum Ulaiyaana Setrilumirundhu Ennaith Thookkiyeduththu, En Kaalgalaik Kanmalaiyinmel Niruththi, En Adigalai Urudhippaduththi,
3 namadhu Dhevanaith Thudhikkum Pudhuppaattai Avar En Vaayile Koduththaar; Anegar Adhaik Kandu, Bayandhu, Karththarai Nambuvaargal.
4 agangaarigalaiyum Poiyaich Saarndhirukkiravargalaiyum Nokkaamal, Karththaraiye Than Nambikkaiyaaga Vaikkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.

5 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Neer Engal Nimiththanjeydha Ummudaiya Adhisayangalum Ummudaiya Yosanaigalum Anegamaayirukkiradhu; Oruvarum Avaigalai Umakku Vivariththuch Sollimudiyaadhu; Naan Avaigalaich Solli Arivikkavendumaanaal Avaigal Ennikkaikku Melaanavaigal.
6 baliyaiyum Kaanikkaiyaiyum Neer Virumbaamal, En Sevigalaith Thirandheer; Sarvaanga Thaganabaliyaiyum Paavanivaaranabaliyaiyum Neer Ketkavillai.
7 appozhudhu Naan: Idho, Varugiren, Busdhagachsurulil Ennaikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu;
8 en Dhevane, Umakkup Piriyamaanadhaich Seyya Virumbugiren; Umadhu Niyaayappiramaanam En Ullaththirkul Irukkiradhu Endru Sonnen.
9 magaa Sabaiyile Needhiyaip Pirasangiththen; En Udhadugalai Mooden, Karththaave, Neer Adhai Ariveer.

10 ummudaiya Needhiyai Naan En Irudhayaththirkul Maraiththuvaikkavillai; Umadhu Saththiyaththaiyum Umadhu Ratchippaiyum Solliyirukkiren; Umadhu Kirubaiyaiyum Umadhu Unmaiyaiyum Magaa Sabaikku Ariviyaadhapadikku Naan Oliththuvaikkavillai.
11 karththaave Neer Ummudaiya Irakkangalai Enakkuk Kidaiyaamar Pogappannaadheyum; Umadhu Kirubaiyum Umadhu Unmaiyum Eppozhudhum Ennaik Kaakkakkadavadhu.

12 ennikkaikku Adangaadha Theemaigal Ennaich Soozhndhukondadhu, En Akkiramangal Ennaith Thodarndhupidiththadhu, Naan Nimirndhu Paarkkakkoodaadhirukkiradhu, Avaigal En Thalaimayirilum Adhigamaayirukkiradhu, En Irudhayam Sorndhupogiradhu.
13 karththaave, Ennai Viduviththarulum; Karththaave, Enakkuch Sagaayampannath Theeviriyum.
14 en Piraananai Azhikkath Thedugiravargal Egamaai Vetki Naani, Enakkuth Theenguseyya Virumbugiravargal Pinnittu Lachchaiyadaivaargalaaga.
15 enperil Aa Aa! Aa Aa! Endru Sollugiravargal, Thangal Vetkaththin Balanaiyadaindhu Kaividappaduvaargalaaga.
16 ummaith Thetugira Anaivarum Umakkul Magizhndhu Sandhoshappaduvaargalaaga; Ummudaiya Ratchippai Virumbugiravargal Karththarukku Magimai Undaavadhaaga Endru Eppozhudhum Solvaargalaaga.
17 naan Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavan, Karththaro Enmel Ninaivaayirukkiraar; Dhevareer En Thunaiyum Ennai Viduvikkiravarumaayirukkireer; En Dhevane, Thaamadhiyaadheyum.
